answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.When the concerned nerves like the facial nerve are irritated it can cause contraction of the facial muscles. This is a normal phenomenon. The twitching could also be due to neuropathy, a disorder of the nerves. Most common cause for neuropathy is diabetes.  It can also be due to metabolic disorders, vitamin deficiencies, infections and traumatic injuries. If your symptoms persist consult your doctor for a neurological evaluation.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
